summary: Have you ever wondered how to get effects like the dawnbreaker sword on armor?
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wondered how to get effects like the dawnbreaker sword on armor?

Look no further, this guide explaines it all :)

Import the sword effects into blender, add bone weight, export and adjust a few
properties and you are good to go.

The process is not very different from regular custom armor process.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you wish to look how to import and export weapons a lot more easily
this is the guide for that:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58679/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58679/?[/url]

If you do a lot of editing (custom armor) you might want to take a look at my modified nif scripts that
make import and export with blender a lot easier:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45355/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45355/?[/url]
author: BB Drac
